name: Froak
description:
Froak!

Eat the flies, avoid the Snappy Crocs, and bounce on the other Froaks to slow them down!

Keyboard Controls: Arrow Keys and Return, with 1, 2, 3, 4 to select a Froak
Alternative, use up to 4 X360 pads with the Dpad/Left Stick to control, and the colour buttons matching the Froak on the main screen with Start to Start!
